interestingcomments.content: Add text inside PNG files /!/ So a few months back there was this please don't open me in browser thing on discord, and inside the png file (after opening it with a text editor) was some text. I have tried to modify and write my own text inside, but after saving it, the png file gets corrupted. Is there a way to write text inside the PNG file?

I have tried to modify and write my own text inside, but after saving it, the png file gets corrupted. Is there a way to write text inside the PNG file?

interestingcomments.content:
RAW files corrupted /!/ I was looking to do a new edit on a concert photo from a couple of years ago, but when I went into the folder, the whole batch of RAW files was corrupt. I can open them but there’s weird distortion all over them. Any suggestions? The distortion comes up in Lightroom and Camera RAW, and can be seen in the file preview (also it’s different distortion).

Using a new MacBook Pro (2018), Canon 5D Mark IV. Files are on an external hard drive.
